The APP of Dolomiti Superski is supposed to be a real online ski guide for those who want to discover the world’s largest ski carousel and is supported by all the operating systems of the most common smart phones. It has new graphics and a modern navigation: horizontal movements (swipe) allow users to switch from one of the 12 ski areas of Dolomiti Superski to the next in numerical order, while vertical movements (scroll) lead to various menu options, functions and services within the chosen ski area. If the GPS function of the device is activated, when the APP is launched, the system will lead to a contents page for the Dolomiti Superski ski area in which the user is located. One can login through the "MyDolomiti" community, after having registered (free of charge) to use the services. The APP offers useful information such as the open/closed status of individual lifts and slopes in real time, opening hours of the lifts, breaks, weather forecasts, points of interest such as ski schools, ski rentals, infopoints, Pick-up Box, as well as descriptions and contacts. 
The user will also find other interesting and popular functions, such as the Performance Check, Tracking option to record the route taken while skiing, Routing which will navigate you to a predetermined point on the slopes. By reaching certain goals with the "Tracking" function, the user will be assigned interesting Badges - a great way to challenge yourself! Are you an angler? Want to fish in Sweden? Don't know where to buy the fishing license?

Then use the app from iFiske! With the app you can search for and read about hundreds of fishing areas in Sweden. You can buy the permit online and get your personal fishing license digitally directly delivered to the app.

In Sweden it is mandatory by law to have a valid fishing license in most waters. Recreational fishing in Sweden is subject the laws of the Swedish fisheries legislation and its associated regulations, and violation may lead to public prosecution.

With iFiskes app, you can find fishing areas by searching by name or looking at our map . The app helps you to buy your own fishing permit using your phone. For all the areas listed in the iFiske app, you can look at pictures from the area, read descriptions of the lake / river, review the fishing rules, see the presence of fish species, and much more! In other workds, this is the perfect tool to plan your fishing trip to Sweden.

In addition to buying permits and searching for fishing areas, you can also manage your purchased fishing licenses and review the rules that apply. The app content is available offline, eg when you have no mobile coverage, which comes handy if you are fishing in a remote area.

The app also contains detailed descriptions of the most common freshwater fishes in Sweden, and articles about common sport fishing methods. 

For iFiske affiliated organizations there are in-app features for inspections of fishing permits and lists of all fishing licenses sold. Checks of permits can easily be done by scanning a QR code, or by entering the unique fishing card number. These features are only available to logged-in users that are connected to an organization that sells fishing licenses via iFiske.

NOTE: If you are missing YOUR favorite fishing area in the app, please do not give the app a bad rating just because of that. We CAN only sell fishing licenses for those organisations that joined the iFiske service.

Hello World!

TEST & IMPROVE YOUR SKILLS WITH AI 
BALLN uses proprietary Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Augmented Reality (AR) technology to measure your football skills so you can get your own real life Player Card. 

We make training and testing fun again. Play and Improve with the BALLN AI. 

BALLN offers indoor and outdoor skill rating tests using AI and AR, training programs and pro tips from BALLN ambassador Kevin de Bruyne, so you can be a Pro Baller. 

Subscribers to BALLN PLUS can access unlimited skill testing and the entire content library of over 350 skill progression videos. 

Download BALLN now and get your Player Card to start improving today!

A REAL LIFE PLAYER CARD
BALLN allows you to measure and benchmark your core football skills: shooting, dribbling, passing, first touch, agility, ball control, reaction time and acceleration. Player Cards have been immortalised by the EA Sports and the FIFA video game franchise, now, through the BALLN app, Player Cards are for everyone, not just the Pro’s.

Our Player Card rating system has been adapted from the latest sports science research, building on research from some of the world's largest football talent identification studies which have tracked 100,000s of youth level players, and in doing so, developed tests that can accurately grade skill level across the skills that matter most.

For the very first time, you can get meaningful metrics on the fundamental skills needed to master your game day performance, as well as benchmark and compare your skills with other real players from all over the world.

IMPROVEMENT TRAINING PROGRAMS
The BALLN app features over 350 training videos across all of the Player Card skills that are available to purchase as an in app subscription plan. These plans bring the best of sports and behavioural science research to you, to help you improve at the most optimal rate for your skill level. Your personalised training program is created based upon your rating and position -- knowledge that was previously available only to elite players.

Our improvement programs go beyond the basic training and repetitive actions of programs of the past – they are formulated in collaboration with global experts in the field of sports and behavioural science and incorporate the very latest views on skill improvement efficiency.

BREAKTHROUGH TECHNOLOGY
At the core of BALLN is an AI-based system for real-time computer vision. As video footage streams from your smartphone camera, the app tracks you and the ball position in 3 dimensions in real-time to provide your Player Card metrics. Our team of leading AI experts have optimized this system to run on your phone itself, removing the need for off-site processing on the field.
All you need to access the outdoor AI skills rating tests is a tall tripod or a friend to hold the phone. Invite them along to see who has the better rating and they can get their Player Card as well!

ZEISS Hunting for the modern hunter – with hunting maps, ballistics calculator, hunting diary, hunting weather and much more! Connect your ZEISS DTC 3, ZEISS DTI 3 and ZEISS Victory RF via Bluetooth and WiFi and use the extensive app features.
* Ballistics: Calculations tailored to your ZEISS riflescope and even to riflescopes from other brands
* Hunting Grounds: Create your hunting grounds and manage them together with fellow hunters

ZEISS Hunting features in detail:

Ballistics Calculator: 
Calculate the ballistics for your long-range or angled shot – precisely tailored to your ZEISS Terra/Victory/Conquest riflescope and your reticle or ASV/ASV+ ballistic turret 
Get your results in imperial and metric units as tables and reticles, including ASV data. For riflescopes from other manufacturers, use the ballistics table.

Atmospheric data ensures the correct calculation for your on-target long-range shot.  

For even more precision, simply calculate the ballistic coefficients for your ammunition.

Save ballistic profiles to have them at hand any time.


Sharing:
Set up your profile and create your friends list.

Keep your friends up-to-date about your hunting successes, ballistics and equipment by sharing your entries with them.


News:
Keep track of all shared entries from you and your friends, like and comment on your friends' posts and stay up-to-date with ZEISS product news and promotions. 


Hunting Grounds:
Draw the borders of your hunting ground, mark no-go areas and define points of interest like raised hide, high seat, feeding point and many more on your Ground Map.

Set the permissions for fellow hunters on the hunting ground. They can also use your hunting ground maps, support you in the management or add diary entries to the hunting ground.
Configure your map settings and use practical map features such as your current position in the area and Geo-Fencing to support you during the hunt.

Assign your diary entries to your hunting grounds for administration.


Hunting Diary: 
Choose from an extensive type list and note down the weight, gender and age. This can also be used for comparing with the shooting plan.

Easily mark kill, shot and sighting position and other incidents on the Hunting Ground map using GPS.

Photos and videos complete your entry.


My Products:
Record your equipment in the app clearly and have all important information at hand, such as invoice, trader, serial number and manual.

Connected Products:
Easily configure your ZEISS Victory RF in the app via Bluetooth. By synchronizing with your ballistic profiles, your range finder will provide you with calculations that are precisely tuned to your ballistics.
Conveniently manage the device settings of your ZEISS DTC 3 in the app via Bluetooth. Remote-control your device and use the Zeroing Assistant to set up zeroing profiles directly from within the app. 
Live-stream to your ZEISS DTI 3 via WiFi. Easily manage your thermal images and videos in the app gallery and share them on social media.
Weather Forecast: 
Detailed 5-day forecast, additionally providing wind direction, wind strength and air pressure as well as the daily moon and solar cycle.

The data of registered users is backed up on ZEISS servers. It is therefore saved if equipment is lost and can be accessed on a variety of end devices.
